game-info.title: Game Information
game-info.prerequisite: Before participating in Avail Racetrack, you need to review the courses on OpenEdu.
game-info.daily-attempts: Players will have 3 attempts per day. The game duration lasts from 7 to 8 minutes
game-info.game-structure: The game will have 4 rounds. Each round will have 5 questions randomly selected from the question set. The time to answer each question is 25 seconds. When time's up, it will automatically move to the next question.
game-info.question-attributes: Each question will have 2 attributes: dealing damage and healing. The amount of damage dealt / health restored will be based on the difficulty level of each question.
game-info.health-system: The starting health of the player and monster on the first day is 25. On subsequent days, the monster's health increases by 5 each day.

question-points.title: Points awarded per question:
question-points.wrong-answer: Wrong answers do not deduct points
question-points.hero-death: Hero runs out of health: -400 points

streak-bonus.title: Winning streak bonus points:
streak-bonus.perfect: Perfect score (all correct in one phase): +100 points

attempt-bonus.title: Attempt bonus points:
attempt-bonus.first: Defeating the monster on the first attempt: +450 points
attempt-bonus.second: Defeating the monster on the second attempt: +150 points

boss-bonus.title: Boss defeat bonus points:
boss-bonus.daily: Defeating the boss in a day: +50 points

reward.title: Rewards
reward.description: Rewards are given based on the leaderboard through the total points calculated according to the rules.
